text: CHECKPOINTS — CHALLENGES We have to stall all txns when take a checkpoint to ensure a consistent snapshot. Scanning the log to find uncommitted txns can take a long time. Not obvious how often the DBMS should take a checkpoint... = £2CMUDB ct l{ > >| ‘D 1:09:33 / 1:15:18 - BUFFER POOL POLICIES > m * E D :] 20 - Database Logging Schemes (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
